mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( MEMBER_ID, PASSWD, MEMBER_NM, SEX, BIRTH_AT, HP, SMSSTS_YN, EMAIL, EMAILSTS_YN ) VALUES( #{memberId}, #{passwd}, #{memberNm}, #{sex}, #{birthAt}, #{hp}, #{smsstsYn}, #{email}, #{emailstsYn} )
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT MEMBER_NM, BIRTH_AT, HP FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NM = #{memberNm}
SELECT PASSWD, ACTIVE_YN FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE MEMBER
MEMBER_NM = #{memberNm},
PASSWD = #{passwd},
SEX = #{sex},
BIRTH_AT = #{birthAt},
HP = #{hp},
SMSSTS_YN = #{smsstsYn},
